tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BuildingMaterials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL,
  energy_consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE building_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    impact_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE material_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
